scripts.test: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=testpass DB_PORT=3306 DB_ENDPOINT=localhost DB_READ_ENDPOINT=localhost mocha --recursive --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevelSilent.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=testpass DB_PORT=3306 DB_ENDPOINT=localhost DB_READ_ENDPOINT=localhost mocha --recursive --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevelDebug.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:stripeLive: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=testpass DB_PORT=3306 DB_ENDPOINT=localhost DB_READ_ENDPOINT=localhost TEST_STRIPE_LIVE=true mocha --recursive --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevelSilent.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:startdb: docker start rothschild-test-mysql || (docker run --name rothschild-test-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=testpass -p 3306:3306 --health-cmd='mysqladmin ping --silent' -d mysql:5.6 mysqld --innodb-strict-mode=ON --sql_mode=IGNORE_SPACE,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES && until [ `docker inspect --format '{{.State.Health.Status}}' rothschild-test-mysql` = "healthy" ]; do echo 'waiting for MySQL to become healthy' && sleep 1; done)
